title: Red carpets and the streets have now declared that on Wednesdays, we wear pink... and red
text:
Red and pink - no longer just a sickly sweet Valentine's Day combo.

Mean Girls Day may have been on October 3rd, but that doesn't mean we can't still reference one of the most iconic contributions to pop culture as we now know it.

However, the "on Wednesdays, we wear pink" line seems to have gotten a twist in 2019, as red has come into the picture. We saw this at the 2019 Emmy Awards when coincidentally, more than one A-lister showed up in red and pink gowns.

And on the cover of the November issue of Harper's Bazaar US, Reese Witherspoon is seen wearing oodles of pink and red ruffles by Alexander McQueen.
